author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-1122] Feature <configfile/> now creates the final file only if the URL stream is available

author: sobryan
msg: This trunk has moved to branches/trinidad-maven-1.2.x.  It will be replaced by the 2.0.x branch.

author: dkulp
msg: Update tests to only produce output in the target directory
Deleted 2 lines too many in previous commit
Fix timing issue in integration test
[CAMEL-4736] Added camel-xstream osgi itest that uses the blueprint.
CAMEL-4714 Applied the full patch of camel-example-cxf-tomcat
[CAMEL-4741] Hazelcast queue producer uses add as a default operation. Added a small test case.
CAMEL-4742: TokenizePair as predicate must close input stream. Fixed some tests on slower boxes / Windows.
Prefer to delete dir in setup for unit tests.
Add svn:ignore for idea generated files
Fix a bunch of warnings in eclipse
CAMEL-4730 Changed cometd SslSocketConnetor to use SslSelectChannelConnector
CAMEL-4468: Added client API for mbeans. Thanks to Marco for the patch. Fixed CS. Improved MBeanInfoAssembler to detect annotations on sub class or interfaces.
CAMEL-4669: Added JMX opertions to clear content cache on ResourceEndpoint. Thanks to Rich Newcomb for the patch.
Fixed hasAttachments method to not lazy create an empty map
Added example based on user forum issue
updated camel-solr to use solr 3.5.0 and its karaf feature to use the SMX Solrj bundle (still snapshot version)
Polished pom.xml names to make integration tests groupeded together and easier to spot in CI server overviews.
Polished pom.xml names to group and make CI overview easier to spot.
Polished pom.xml names to group and make CI overview easier to spot.
[CAMEL-4746] Use the Karaf command format in Camel commands
Try to avoid port in use issue in test
CAMEL-4745: Added detail about subscription header if avail. Thanks to Andrew for the patch.
Fixed camel-jms tests on Windows when using persistent AMQ broker
CAMEL-4468: MBean API should inheirt. Thanks to Marco for the patch.
Added test due user forum issue
CAMEL-4758: Polished javadoc. Thanks to Glen Mazza for the patch.
CAMEL-4701: Polished camel-example-cxf. Thanks to Glen for the patch. I did a svn rm, and svn add for the files that was moved, as reanme with patch does not work well.
CAMEL-4762 Upgraded the hawtbuf version to 2.7
CAMEL-4709 Fixed ClassNotFoundException thrown by hawtbuf codec decode in OSGi
CAMEL-4765: Perfer to use API which takes type paramter over explict type casting. We can do this now Spring 3.0+ is min. Thanks to Babak for the patch.
Added unit test based on user forum issue

CAMEL-4773: Dynamic Router, Routing Slip and other EIPs which accept an expression for endpoints, should cater for bean endpoints separated by comma. Where a bean endpoint uses method name parameter using parantheses with comma included. ObjectHelper.createIterator needs to honor this, when its iterating a String value.
